A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Too many unnecessary side stories. No character development. Snoke-dissappointing story. Luke-story isn't believable and spits in the face of all the points you know from all other Jedi in history. Rose-shoehorned into the plot as a SJW. First Order-completely inept as far as battle tactics and common sense. Far too much comedy for a movie with such a serious tone. Sorry I didn't wait for the bootleg.
